The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 25 January is 3,207,381 (5,698.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 20 January, there were 236,804 new confirmed cases (420.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 13 January, there were 294,602 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 20% (57,798 fewer cases).
